answers.answer: I had mine at 27 so I'm gonna say yes. They're not harmful to the baby, just unpleasant if you get sick.
Yes you can take it most doctors do it between 24 and 28 weeks!

question: I am 26 weeks almost 27 tomorrow . Will my doctor allow me to come in at 27 weeks to take it?
title: Sugar Glucose Test! -Gestational Diabetes.
